tasks.task: Plant Atlantic dill giant pumpkin seeds
subtasks: Retrieve 4x4 container
Fill container with moist potting soil
Create a hole in the soil for the seed
Identify seed's pointy end
Position seed in the hole with the pointy end downward
Ensure soil is moist but not firmed
Water the seed lightly
Store seeds in a germination station with heat mat and cover
Maintain temperature around 78-80 degrees Fahrenheit
Provide light immediately upon emergence
Monitor for first true leaf to determine vine direction
Prepare for transplanting after approximately two weeks

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Planting Atlantic Dill Giant Pumpkin Seeds
subtasks: Gather a 4x4 container
Fill container with moist potting soil
Create planting holes
Determine seed orientation (pointy end down)
Embed seeds properly in the soil
Ensure adequate moisture
Place seed container in a warm, humid environment
Apply heat mat for temperature regulation
Provide consistent light post-emergence
Monitor for first true leaf to assess growth direction
Prepare for transplantation when seedling is two weeks old
